contestant_info.name: Emily Rodriguez
personal_goals: • Promote educational opportunities for underserved communities
• Develop leadership programs for young women
• Use pageant platform to raise awareness about educational inequality

script.question: Welcome, Emily Rodriguez! It's great to have you with us. To start, could you tell us a little about your journey and what motivated you to participate in this pageant?
Your profile mentions • Public Speaking. Could you walk us through a moment when this skill was essential to your success in a public setting?
Our pageant values . Can you tell us how you've demonstrated this value in your life?
Can you share an instance where you had to quickly think on your feet during an event or stage performance?
Describe a situation where you had to deal with a difficult contestant or judge. How did you manage the situation?
If you faced a setback during your competition, how would you keep yourself motivated to push forward?
If you were to win the title today, how would you use the platform to influence positive change in your community?
What do you believe is the most significant issue facing young women today, and how would you address it as a pageant winner?
You've given us a lot to think about today. Before we conclude, do you have any final words or questions about the competition or next steps?
